news.headline: Blue Star Foods Reports 19% Growth to $2.3 Million Revenue for First Quarter Ended March 31, 2024
news.summary: Increase in Revenues Leads to 44% Reduction in Losses Miami, FL, May 20, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Blue Star Foods Corp., (“Blue Star,” the “Company,” “we,” “our” or “us”) (NASDAQ: BSFC), an integrated Environmental, Social, and Governance (“ESG”) sustainable seafood company with a focus on Recirculatory Aquaculture Systems (“RAS”), announced unaudited financial and operational results for the three months ended March 31, 2024. news.headline: Blue Star Foods Announces 1-for-50 Reverse Stock Split
